> **crochet dishcloth series
** > ======================================= > this design is part of a larger collection of dishcloth patterns all of which feature a unique stitch pattern
> find out more here → ** ned & mimi crochet dishcloth series 1 ** **tunisian fade washcloth** this easy tunisian crochet dishcloth is created using just one stitch but showcases a beautiful color-fade effect through simple color changes if you are brand new to tunisian crochet then this pattern is a great one to try you will get lots of practice with the tunisian simple stitch which is the most basic tunisian crochet stitch this project is easy to follow with written instructions and a helpful visual guides the pattern is written for 2 sizes - washcloth and tea towel - but also includes instructions for adjusting the stitch pattern to make a custom size **materials** **yarn ** any weight 4 / worsted weight yarn in a cotton or cotton blend * washcloth 90yds / 82m approx 21yds / 19m each for colors 1 and 3 and 48yds/ 44m for color 2 * tea towel 400yds / 366m approx approx 96yds / 88m colors 1 and 3 and 208yds/ 190m for color 2 *recommended yarns * * drops paris 2 * wecrochet dishie 3 * paintbox yarns cotton aran 4 * lion brand 24/7 cotton 5 * rico creative cotton aran 6 **hook ** 6 5mm k-10 5 crochet hook 7 --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 8 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2024 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/free-crochet-dishcloth-patterns/ 2 https //www laughinghens com/knitting-wool/drops-paris#nedandmimi 3 https //shrsl com/4cok0 4 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/paintbox-yarns-cotton-aran utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 5 https //lovecrafts com/en-us/p/lion-brand-24-7-cotton utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 6 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/rico-creative-cotton-aran utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 7 https //shrsl com/3p74i 8 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
